metadata.description: Extend the knowledge base with new topics, skills, and templates

frontmatter.name: extend-knowledge
frontmatter.description: Extend knowledge base through research, documents, or user input

sections.title: Extend Knowledge Skill
sections.introduction: This skill enables extending the project's knowledge base with new topics, patterns, and skills. It supports multiple research methods and ensures systematic updates to all related artifacts.
whenToUse: When adding knowledge about a new technology or framework
When creating a new reusable skill
When incorporating external documentation or links
When the knowledge base has gaps for your project domain

process.name: Identify Extension Type
process.description: Determine what type of artifact to create
actions: Knowledge file - for patterns, conventions, best practices
Template - for code or document generation

process.name: Research & Gather Information
methods: Document reading - for provided PDFs or documentation
User links - for specific URLs to incorporate
Repository analysis - for existing codebase patterns

process.name: Generate Structured Content
process.description: Create the artifact following project conventions
actions: Follow JSON schema patterns for validation
Include version, description, and axiom alignment

process.name: Update Related Artifacts
process.description: Ensure all dependent files are updated

process.name: Validate & Verify
process.description: Ensure the extension is correct and complete
actions: Run JSON validation on new files

sections.outputFormat:
### Extension Complete

| Artifact | Type | Path | Status |
|----------|------|------|--------|
| {NAME} | {TYPE} | {PATH} | Created/Updated |
importantRules: ALWAYS follow existing knowledge file patterns
ALWAYS update manifest.json after creating knowledge files
ALWAYS validate JSON syntax before completing
